This lift was originally called Northeast Passage and was 9243 feet long with 1436 vertical, the longest triple chair in the world.  The bottom terminal was moved uphill in the mid 1990s.

This lift runs in a triangle, with the uphill side turning about halfway.  The downhill section is only 4128 feet long.  Towers 12 and 13 have entire bullwheels mounted on them.
